#labels Featured
Show objects information and checking for malicious pdf

= Objects Information =

For PDF files FileInfo shows a new menu with the option *PDF Object*. In addition, FileInfo automatically analyzes the PDF file for *<a href="http://code.google.com/p/fileinfo-gui/wiki/pdf?ts=1304768792&updated=pdf#Malicious_PDF">malicious objects</a>*.


== Screenshot ==

Objects Counts

[http://dl.dropbox.com/u/3086328/fileinfo/fileinfo-pdfobj-count.png]

= Malicious PDF =

If malicious objects have been identified, menu will present a new entry: *PDF Malware*

References: <a href="http://blog.didierstevens.com/programs/pdf-tools/">Didier Stevens</a>
